pull.title: wallet: Translate all initErrors in CreateWalletFromFile
pull.body:
The translations are going to close in three days (#15940), so I am submitting this as a standalone pull request.

Those changes are part of a bugfix #16661, which includes a test. The first change (the refactor) is required, the second commit is not. I am happy to drop it, if needed.

committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1567021946 -0400

util: Make util/error bilingual_str (refactor)

Translated strings should not end up in the debug log, stderr, or
returned by an RPC.

Changing the util methods in util/error to return a bilingual_str paves
the way to achieve this goal in the long term.

two. Translate them as well for consistency.

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16771](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16771.html) (Chainparams: Wallet: Decouple DefaultFallbackfee() from IsTestChain() by jtimon)
* [#16661](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16661.html) (wallet: Fix segfault in CreateWalletFromFile, Pass error to rpc caller by MarcoFalke)
* [#16224](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16224.html) (gui: Bilingual GUI error messages by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Concept ACK. Will review in details tonight.
ACK fa61365a1368f9970fa22fb96f89f4ecc08e69f0, I have tested the code on Linux Mint 19.2.
